      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_8c8d1994bd60e835117a5fdabd363f44f10d5f08</entry>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_8c8d1994bd60e835117a5fdabd363f44f10d5f08</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of polyester through condensation polymerisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung von Polyester durch 
Kondensationpolymerisierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de polyester par la polymérisation de 
condensation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do poliéster com a polimerização da
condensação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di poliestere con polimerizzazione di 
condensazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός του πολυεστέρα μέσω του πολυμερισμού 
συμπύκνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del poliester con la polimerización 
de la condensación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation for the formation of polyester through condensation polymerisation, where a water molecule is lost and condensation reaction occurs as each ester link is made.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensation reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ester link</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polyester</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung für die 
Anordnung von Polyester durch Kondensationpolymerisierung, in der ein 
Wassermolekül verloren ist und Kondensationreaktion auftritt, 
während jedes Esterlink gebildet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation pour la 
formation du polyester par la polymérisation de condensation, où une
molécule d'eau est détruite et réaction de condensation se produit 
pendant que chaque lien d'ester est fait.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação para a 
formação do poliéster com a polimerização da condensação, onde 
uma molécula de água está perdida e reação da condensação 
ocorre enquanto cada ligação do ester é feita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione per la 
formazione di poliestere con polimerizzazione di condensazione, dove 
una molecola di acqua è persa e reazione di condensazione accade 
mentre ogni collegamento dell'estere è fatto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση για το 
σχηματισμό του πολυεστέρα μέσω του πολυμερισμού συμπύκνωσης, 
όπου ένα μόριο ύδατος χάνεται και η αντίδραση συμπύκνωσης 
εμφανίζεται καθώς κάθε σύνδεση εστέρα γίνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación para la 
formación del poliester con la polimerización de la condensación, 
donde se pierde una molécula de agua y reacción ocurre de la 
condensación mientras que se hace cada conexión del éster.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensationreaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Esterlink</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polyester</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wassermolekül</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction de condensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lien d'ester</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poliéster</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">molécula de água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poliestere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equazione di reazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molecola di acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντίδραση συμπύκνωσης</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
